labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The playing status doesn't change untill you restart either the game or discord or untill the rich presence updates like in osu!
data.short_description: When toggling "hide playing status" for a specific game while playing it, it doesn't update your playing status.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a game. -  Make sure you have enabled the playing estatus in settings > game activity. - Go to library tab and hide the playing status for the game you are playing. - Observe your playing status with another account or ask someone else if they can see it.
